text:
GREAT DECISIONS, 1963
Page 2
A. All Active affiliates having Identical or overlapping coverage areas shall
have equal access to all NAEB programs,
B, Associate Member Affiliates broadcasting NAEB programs over radio stations
having identical or overlapping coverage areas shall have equal access to
NAEB programs for which they are eligible.
Cm Commercial Affiliates having Identical or overlapping coverage areas shall
have equal access to NAEB programs for which they are eligible,
D, International Affiliates having identical or overlapping coverage areas
shall have equal access to NAEB programs for which they are eligible,
E, Commercial Affiliates, International Affiliates and Associate Member
Affiliates broadcasting NAEB programs over radio stations whose coverage
areas are Identical to or overlap those of Active Affiliates shall have
access to current network program offerings by elthen
1, Securing and presenting to the Network Manager the written permission
of each Active Affiliate involved; or
2, Delaying broadcast of such programs until ninety (90) days following
the original network release date for the programs desired,
F, Stations not affiliated with the network wishing to broadcast NAEB programs
over radio stations whose coverage areas are identical to or overlap those
of Active Affiliates or Commercial Affiliates or International Affiliates
or the radio stations broadcasting NAEB programs received through Associate
Member Affiliates shall have access to current network program offerings
by either*
1, Securing and presenting to the Network Manager the written permission
of the affiliate or affiliates Involved; or
2, Delaying broadcast of such programs until ninety (90) days following
the original network release date for the programs desired.
In the case of this series we are making one slight deviation from the above
policies: Affiliates who do not order the series by the announced deadline
for such orders shall thereby waive control over broadcast of the series within
their coverage area, and the network shall have the right to place the series
within their coverage areas without further notice or consultation,
(Any station having questions about availability of the programs should contact
the network for specific information,)
